term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - surface excess concentration (at an interface), Γ
term.title: surface excess concentration

item.text: A quantity defined by Γ i = n i σ A s is the surface excess (or adsorption) of component i and As is the area of the dividing surface or interface.

item.alttext: Γ i = n i σ A s

sources.item: PAC, 1986, 58, 967. 'Reporting data on adsorption from solution at the solid/solution interface (Recommendations 1986)' on page 970 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198658070967)
